title: srI ramaa ramaNi
sahitya:
shrI ramA ramaNI manOhara shrtajana mandAra 



(shrI)







anupallavi







ghOra dAnava mada vida caraNa mucukunda varada nandagOpa kumAra

(shrI)







caraNam 1








atulita divyaguNAbharaNa sanakAdi munivarya mAnasa sadana
nata janArti haraNa manjUbhASaNa nava nIla shubhAnga dhrta rathAnga
(shrI)







caraNam 2







sanaka sanandanAdi vinuta sarva vEda vEda
svarUpa dinakara kulAbdhi ghambhIra divya nAmAnka niSkaLanka
(shrI)







caraNam 3






mandara giridhara parAtpara-tamAla pallava sadrsha bhAsamAna
sundara purandarAdi vandita suprasanna varada venkataramaNa

(shrI)
